verses.name: Genesis 33:5
verses.text: And he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The children which God hath graciously given thy servant.

verses.name: Genesis 33:6
verses.text: Then the handmaidens came near, they and their children, and they bowed themselves.

verses.name: Genesis 33:7
verses.text: And Leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came Joseph near and Rachel, and they bowed themselves.

verses.name: Genesis 33:8
verses.text: And he said, What meanest thou by all this drove which I met? And he said, These are to find grace in the sight of my lord.
